== Video Overview ==

This video shows a user how to install Ubuntu on a completely blank machine. It goes through the installation using the desktop CD, but also refers to the alternate CD - which may be covered in another screencast. 

== Target Audience ==

* Users

== Pre-requisites ==

* None

== Required Knowledge ==

* None

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* InstallingUbuntuDualBoot - To appreciate the difference between a clean install and a dual-boot one.

== Objectives ==

* Describe the difference between the Desktop and Alternate CDs
* Install Ubuntu on a blank machine
* Outline the main steps of the install, including the questions that are asked
